about_the_game:
"This is the same old story of rescuing maidens from the clutches of villains and rapists such as goblins and trolls, werewolves and harpies. You will meet them and many others all across the different locations the game has to offer.
Your decisions will directly affect the plot and the main character's leveling up. Paladin spells won't work if your character is vile or lustful. You can get one of several different endings.




Game features:

  • A moral dilemma: You can either fuck the next succubus or not die
  • A not-so-obvious randomized choice – go right or die
  • An archetypal, but not too banal plot (or so we think)

  • The main character is a horny paladin
  • Decisions made throughout the game will affect the ending
  • Save the maidens, then fuck them!
  • Japanese voice-over
  • Exciting battles and other QTE-based activities
  • You can raid caravans
  • 10+ beautifully animated sex scenes

content_descriptors.notes:
The narrative includes themes of a sexual nature, including master-slave relationships, thought-provoking content, and exploration of dark desires.
Violence in the game is limited, however, combat includes hand-to-hand and ranged combat (including blood).
Damsels in Distress contains depictions of sexual acts, including, among others, BSDM "master/slave", gratuitous nudity, bodily fluids and blood, "coercive role play" by mutual consent, and much more. Depiction of zoophilia in the game is absent.
All characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
"This is the same old story of rescuing maidens from the clutches of villains and rapists such as goblins and trolls, werewolves and harpies. You will meet them and many others all across the different locations the game has to offer.
Your decisions will directly affect the plot and the main character's leveling up. Paladin spells won't work if your character is vile or lustful. You can get one of several different endings.

name: Damsels in Distress Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 Bit Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD5850
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64 Bit Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Damsels in Distress is an interactive adventure. You will play as a lustful paladin who’d have to choose between sex and duty all the time. All this is accompanied by awesome sex animations and Japanese voice-over.
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Ukrainian, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
